activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shane T Hart

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
10:13 AM Defendant Shane T Hart appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Rockow appears by video. Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Rockow relates DE qualifies for PD and counsel has not yet been appointed.  Notice of Hearing to be sent to Barron County Jail as DE is currently homeless.  DE to update address with Clerk of Courts Office within 48 of new residence. Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:14 PM Defendant Shane T Hart appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Shane T Hart for today only. Court Reporter appeared by Zoom video means. 
Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney.  Address confirmed and phone number provided.   1:18 p.m. Defendant and Attorney Kitto placed in a breakout room. 1:21 p.m. back on the record.  Attorney Kitto relates and requests signature bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
